header.heading: Algo.Java
header.subHeading: Advanced Data Structures & Algorithms in Java

highlights.content: Special Session on Java Game Development

overview.content:
It’s time to improvise how you learn with Coding Blocks Live Classroom Program. Our Live Classroom Program has been designed to be an exact replica of our Classroom Program.. The course has been launched to cater to the needs of students at the time of the quarantine period.. Our Algo.java Live Program the best solution for all budding programmers who want to gain expertise in DS & Algo or are appearing for their internship/placement interviews.

The Live Algo.java Program would ensure that students get to learn from the best mentors at the comfort of their homes, saving them from all the traveling hassles. It would allow the students to get all benefits of classroom learning right inside their homes.

With our Live Program, you can avail benefits like immediate doubt resolution from mentor, recorded video lecture after each class, hand-written mentor notes, and a lot more.

The classes start with a basic revision of recursion and Arrays. Advanced topics such as OOP(s), Complexity Analysis, Data Structures & Algorithms will be covered in the following classes.

courseHighlights.title: Problem Solving
courseHighlights.content: The course is designed to sharpen the problem solving skills of the students. We follow step-by-step approach to make students fall in love with programming and ignite their passion of coding with the help of problems ranging to easy to intermediate to expert level.

courseHighlights.title: OOP Concepts & Project
courseHighlights.content: Emphasis is given on building strong Object Oriented Programming Concepts and coding practices followed in the Software Industry, so to make our students industry-ready. Students will also build a game with Java Swing Libraries to strengthen their OOPS concepts.

courseHighlights.title:
Data Structures 
& Algorithms
courseHighlights.content: This course entails more than 100 hours of teaching and hands on coding. Students will be solving more than 200 complex problems and will be evaluated for their problem solving skills and understanding of data structures throughout the course.

faqs.ques: Will this help me with competitive programming or can I apply to ACM-ICPC after doing this course?
faqs.ans: This course will help you become smarter with your solutions. You’ll be able to write solutions that run in lesser space and time. The last time we heard from capable competitive programmers, they said these skills made them capable.

faqs.ques: Will this course help me in Interviews?
faqs.ans: Yes. If you learn well, all that the course intends to teach, you’ll be able to impress quite a few interviewers across quite a few fine companies.

faqs.ques: Will this help me in making websites and apps?
faqs.ans: No. This is a fundamentals course. To make websites and apps, you need to learn more. Please check out our Pandora & Elixir course for those.

faqs.ques: Is this CORE Java or Advanced Java?
faqs.ans: This is not CORE java or Advanced Java. This is a course which teaches you problem solving, data structures and Object Oriented Programming. Though, most of what CORE java means is being covered. The aim of the course is to help you with a smarter beginning. For being able to make web and mobile apps you need to learn frameworks. Android is one such framework for mobile apps. Please check out our Pandora and Elixir course for more details on these lines.
